fuchsia-multiple-inheritance.description:
Description

The
fuchsia-multiple-inheritance
check is an alias, please See
misc-multiple-inheritance
for details.

See the features disallowed in Fuchsia at
https://fuchsia.dev/fuchsia-src/development/languages/c-cpp/cxx?hl=en
fuchsia-multiple-inheritance.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
